Not sure which is Council District is yours? Just click to see the Voting Districts .

City Council Meetings

La Marque City Council Regular Meetings are held at 6:00 p.m. on the second & fourth Monday of each month in City Council Chambers, at 1109B Bayou Road, La Marque Texas 77568.

In accordance with the order of the Office of the Governor issued on March 16, 2020, the La Marque City Council will conduct in-person meetings as well as via teleconference (ZOOM) in order to advance the public health goal of limiting face-to-face meetings to slow the spread of COVID-19.

Register for calendar reminders

Every City Council Meeting is available to watch via live stream on YouTube. Comcast customers can watch for free on Channel 16.

Subscribe to our YouTube Channel

(Limited to three minutes per person) Comments from the public will be heard at this time. Any person with city related business who has signed up may speak to Council on a specific agenda item (limited to three (3) minutes) should give the Mayor your name and the item you wish to speak about. In compliance with Texas Open Meeting Act, the City may not deliberate on comments.
